person.bio: Ramez has about 10 years of experience in CloudComputing software. He joined Kristof and his team on 2008, Started in Q-layer, Amplidata, GiG and currently TFtech. Currently Ramez is working as a quality control and operations teamleader. Engineer fell in love with Threefold Threefold is the upcoming internet future, we are creating conscious futures together.
person.excerpt: Ramez has about 10 years of experience in CloudComputing software.
